mapper.select: SELECT E.EVENT_ID, E.EVENT_TIME, E.EVENT_DATE, E.IMG_PATH, E.MANAGE, C.LOCATION AS LOCATION, D.ITEM_TYPE, D.ITEM_COUNT FROM DETECT_EVENT E JOIN CCTV C ON E.CCTV_ID = C.CCTV_ID JOIN DETECT_ITEM D ON E.EVENT_ID = D.EVENT_ID

SELECT E.EVENT_ID, E.EVENT_TIME, E.IMG_PATH, E.MANAGE, C.LOCATION AS CCTV_LOCATION, D.TYPE, D.COUNT FROM DETECT_EVENT E JOIN CCTV C ON E.CCTV_ID = C.CCTV_ID JOIN DETECT_ITEM D ON E.EVENT_ID = D.EVENT_ID WHERE (#{type} IS NULL OR D.TYPE = #{type}) AND (#{from} IS NULL OR E.EVENT_TIME >= #{from}) AND (#{to} IS NULL OR E.EVENT_DATE <= #{to}) AND (#{manage} IS NULL OR E.MANAGE = #{manage}) ORDER BY E.EVENT_TIME DESC
